name: Cat Attack
description:
[Note: RPG Maker has an unremovable "feature" where F12 resets the game to the title screen. You will have to change the screenshot key or manually take screenshots.

Cat Attack is a game inspired by traditional 1990s JRPGs. It is most similar to Final Fantasy Mystic Quest or the Lufia series, with turn-based combat, enemy portraits and action results on the top of the screen, and party information at the bottom.

The game does not feature custom sprites but utilizes VX Ace's character creator.

Dungeons were designed by me and tested by myself and others, rather than using the random dungeon generator that comes with the program.

Features:

Variety of characters with their own unique skills and abilities
Plot-based learned skills
Tactics (weakness/absorb/resistance) to various elements
Dozens of weapons/armors/items
Dozens of unique enemies
100+ of skills/magic abilities
